Name: Pollywog Tail

Name: Pollywog Pearl
RawApplication: Gain +1 to your next non-luck Check.

Name: Gargoyle Gem
RawApplication: Increase Rank of next attack by 1.

Name: Enchanted Stone Fragment
RawApplication: Give yourself 25 Temporary Health until the start of your next turn.

Name: Nightmare Residue
RawApplication: On level-up, increase gained max-health by 50%.

Name: Royal Armor Piece
RawApplication: When taking cover, increase your Cover score by 3.

Name: Gudon Eye
RawApplication: Reduce penalty of light-factors by 1 rank for 1 hour.

Name: Gudon Liver
RawApplication: Reduce damage of incoming Fire-element attacks by 1 Rank.

Name: Gudon Tail
RawApplication: Until the start of your next turn, effects that any of your Vitals are increased by 50%.

Name: Pincer Set
RawApplication: Increase Critical Threshold by 2 until next of battle.
